hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn ‘Umar that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:“Whatever is cut from an animal hen it is still alive, what is cut from it is Maitah (dead meat).”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا قُطِعَ مِنَ الْبَهِيمَةِ وَهِيَ حَيَّةٌ
chapter.eng-name: What is cut from an animal when it is still alive
